appDesc.message: Setup custom redirect rules for any http request i.e pages, scripts, images etc.

cswitcheroo.message: This extension is an re-worked version of Switcheroo and derived from: https://github.com/ranjez/Switcheroo

cswitcherooplus.message: Switcheroo plus can redirect any web request (no matter if URL typed, images, scripts, css, etc. on page).
cswitcherooplus.description: description what the plus version is.

save.description: title text if user clicks on the save icon

saverule.description: title text if user clicks on the save new rule icon

edit.description: title text if user clicks on an edit icon

remove.description: title text if user clicks on a delete icon

from.description: caption text of the first rule column

to.description: caption text of the second rule column

removeall.description: button text for remove all rules

exportall.description: button text for the export button

importall.description: button text for the import button

norules.message: You have no redirect rules at the moment.
norules.description: fallback text if user has no rules yet

createnew.description: caption text of the new rule box

confirmclear.message: This will remove all rules. Are you sure?

confirmimport.message: This will overwrite all existing rules. Are you sure?

helpstring.message: The string replacement searches for the first occurance of that string and replaces it.

helpregex.message: You can enter a short definition (i.e.. 'HelloWorld') or a full qualified RegEx string with switches (i.e. '/HelloWorld/ig').

helpswitch.message: Click on the gears icon to toggle between both modes.
helpswitch.description: click on the gears icon to toggle modes

toolsOptionsOnly.message: The tools are available on the options page ONLY.
toolsOptionsOnly.description: the tools are available on the options page only (due to the very limited space)

importexplain.message: Paste the JSON text from your last export here and press the import button. Attention: this will overwrite all your existing rules!

exportexplain.message: The text here are all your rules, exported into a JSON text. Just copy & paste it into a text editor.
